data.description: Gibney Online Studio is a digital dance space. Join us, wherever you are, for live, online classes with renowned teaching artists in New York City and beyond. Lets keep moving together and finding new ways to connect! These classes are open to movers of all levels!  From Monday, June 8 through Tuesday, June 30, all revenue… from Gibney Online Studio drop-in classes will be donated to Black-led organizations or groups fighting against racism and in defense of Black lives. We are working collaboratively with our teaching artists and staff to identify the organizations we will support and at the end of the month, Gibney will make three donations split evenly between the selected groups.  Class Description: Often dancers suffer through chronic to acute injuries that are preventable. In this 45 minute class, teacher trainers from the Kane School and Kinected will address common faulty biomechanics from the pli to the pass to jumping. This class will incorporate exercises that will rectify faulty mechanics, restoring you for your next show or strengthening you for that next tour. Additionally, home care exercises will be covered as well that you can take on the road.  Level: Open  PAYMENTPay what you can. The suggested contribution is $10, but $5 and free options are also available. The Teaching Artists or Partner Organizations will receive a portion of the proceeds. Existing Class Credits or Class Series cannot be applied to online classes at this time.  REGISTRATION  Classes will be streamed live via Zoom. Students must pre-register for class and download the Zoom app to join. Registration will close 20 minutes before the class time. 15 minutes before class, you will receive an email with the Zoom link.  All classes are in Eastern Standard Time.  SUPPORT  Gibney needs your support to continue offering online programming, supporting artists, and fulfilling our mission in this moment of uncertainty. Your generosity has unprecedented value and urgency at this time. Donate today https://gibneydance.secure.force.com/donate/?dfId=a0n2S00000kaqefQAA&_

data.name: Martial Mind
data.description: Martial Mind (Ages 5 - 7) is an 18-24 month, traditional martial arts-based Social and Emotional Learning (SEL) certification program, inspired by Headmaster Kwok's program designed for formal education. We, as educators, aim to nurture the character development of our students so they can grow into respectful,… well-coping, and moral individuals. As children at this age are still in the early stages of developing cognitive skills, the belt system is divided into different checkpoints for the preparation of their entry to the Juniors program.Besides learning to kick and punch properly, as well as age-appropriate self-defense techniques, we will spotlight a key theme, such as respect, focus, integrity, and self-control. We will demonstrate the meaning behind the selected theme and how it benefits the students' social skills and emotional competencies through physical practice. We aim to guide students to transfer the skills learned in class to their lives in academic and home settings.  Upon completion of the Martial Mind program, our students will receive an official certificate issued by Martial Arts Education Society. They are expected to progress in our Juniors Taekwon-do program at an accelerated rate.

data.name: Kids Boxing
data.description: The greatest gift we can give our kids is confidence to defend themselves physically, but also to score a goal, raise their hand, or speak their mind. Confidence is a skill that can be learned and boxing is the perfect teacher. How to stand, how to breathe, what to focus on and pushing past perceived limitations are just… some of the lessons that boxing has to offer...when taught correctly. We support out young boxers and encourage them to apply what they learn here, outside the ring as well. Our classes are non contact and are suited for all skill levels. Boxing is a perfect compliment as a second sport. Some of our current and former members play and excel at the collegiate and professional levels and attribute boxing to the their success.

data.name: LIVESTREAM YOGASPARK: Summer Hits Playlist
data.description: Get in the mood for summer, beach, and sun with a bubbly flow led by Lara!  Please join us for one of our brand new livestream classes, via Zoom. The same YogaSpark style in a whole new medium! The details:-Register for this class no later than 30 minutes before class start time-15 minutes prior to class, you… will receive a link from one of our managers to a Zoom meeting, which you can access from your desktop, laptop, iPad or phone. You will likely be prompted to download the Zoom app to whatever device you are using.-You will also receive a link to a Spotify playlist (see below).The class will open up to participants 15 minutes prior to class start time and will begin promptly at class start time. --We will sign you in to the class as you join the Zoom meeting.-You will have the option to be seen or not seen by your instructor. Should you choose to be seen, that will help them give you verbal adjustments and shout outs as well as create more of a class vibe, but it is entirely up to you! You will be muted once class starts but will be able to chat with the instructor if you have any questions.-Class will be an open level, challenging, fun power flow in the classic YogaSpark style, with plenty of modifications and options.-There will be no music during class, but your instructor will tell you when to press play on the Spotify playlist so that the class can move with the music in sync. You will likely need a second device to play the music from.  Thank you for bearing with us during these technically challenging times, as we attempt to recreate the YogaSpark experience as best we can on various platforms!

data.name: Tai Chi Fundamentals: Not Only For Beginners
data.description: The word "Beginner" sounds deceptively elementary. But it is not so. After two decades, I still repeat the beginners routine as the indispensable starter for my daily practice. My grandfather taught me this routine when I was seven years old. Every time I thought I got them, I discovered later there was a deeper layer...  Also, the old… school Tai Chi study is my answer to address the problems of body-mind that cannot be solved by any amount of scientific progress or material comfort. Unlike the current copy-your-instructor exercise modality, studying Tai Chi in a traditional way is a self-discovery process and a reminder to what you have known deep inside you. It is an art that creates a profound and uplifting unity of body and mind. The class aims at creating a supportive environment for you to communicate with your body and mind by following the core principles of Tai Chi. You will experience Tai Chis healing power. Also, the class will help you form good habits and integrate Tai Chi into every moment of your life. The class emphasizes static and simple dynamic balance and body-mind reconnection to improve overall wellness, avoid injuries, and achieve well-being.  The maximum number of participants is seven, in order to ensure that everyone receives sufficient attention to get optimal benefit from the practice.  I am looking forward to experiencing the joy of Tai Chi study with all of you.  May Tai Chi become a rewarding aspect of your life!

data.description: This class takes place live via Zoom. Ashtanga | Mysore All LevelsSuitable for all levels, Mysore Ashtanga format is a one-room schoolhouse, with practitioners just starting out on the set sequence studying alongside practitioners well into Third and Fourth Series under the guidance and support of a skilled teacher. Mysore ashtanga is a moving meditation where each pose is strung together on the the thread of breath. Students will learn the traditional sequence of Ashtanga slowly and methodically. All students are welcome; come as you are.Please note that Mysore Ashtanga is not a drop-in class. Mysore practice is unique in that its potency lies in making a consistent commitment of 3-6 days a week. This is a requirement. We ask that you allow at least one month of dedicated practice to see if the method is right for you. You are welcome to come observe to see if you would like to try it.

data.name: LIVESTREAM YOGASPARK: Born to Run
data.description: The same YogaSpark that you love, but tailored to especially complement a running practice. Join Nick as he leads you through a flow that works through the tensions and issues that can pop up when you pound the pavement. We suggest taking a 30 minute jog beforehand if you REALLY want to amp it up!  Please join us… for one of our brand new livestream classes, via Zoom. The same YogaSpark style in a whole new medium! The details:-Register for this class no later than 30 minutes before class start time-15 minutes prior to class, you will receive a link from one of our managers to a Zoom meeting, which you can access from your desktop, laptop, iPad or phone. You will likely be prompted to download the Zoom app to whatever device you are using.-You will also receive a link to a Spotify playlist (see below).The class will open up to participants 15 minutes prior to class start time and will begin promptly at class start time. --We will sign you in to the class as you join the Zoom meeting.-You will have the option to be seen or not seen by your instructor. Should you choose to be seen, that will help them give you verbal adjustments and shout outs as well as create more of a class vibe, but it is entirely up to you! You will be muted once class starts but will be able to chat with the instructor if you have any questions.-Class will be an open level, challenging, fun power flow in the classic YogaSpark style, with plenty of modifications and options.-There will be no music during class, but your instructor will tell you when to press play on the Spotify playlist so that the class can move with the music in sync. You will likely need a second device to play the music from.  Thank you for bearing with us during these technically challenging times, as we attempt to recreate the YogaSpark experience as best we can on various platforms!

data.description: Mindfulness is the basic human ability to be fully present, aware of where we are and what were doing, and not overly reactive or overwhelmed by whats going on around us. While mindfulness is something we all naturally possess, its more readily available to us when we practice on a daily basis. Mindfulness meditation is a… practice that involves focusing the mind on your experiences in the present moment and as a result, relieve stress and tension from the body and the mind.In this class we'll use breathing practices, mental imagery, awareness of body and mind, as well as muscle and body relaxation to explore the present moment non-judgmentally in the service of self-understanding and wisdom.

data.name: Tribute to the Angels - Prenatal Khalsa Way - All Levels
data.description: During the nine-months of pregnancy a woman experiences enormous physical, emotional and spiritual changes that prepare her to create and welcome another human being into the world. Yoga and Meditation may be the strongest offering that you can give to yourself when pregnant. To actively move your body, to learn… to breath properly, to close your eyes, to meditate, to go inside where your baby is -- from this you will tap into your intuition and come to know the answers. By cultivating and living in calmness, radiance, joy and good health, you will create this atmosphere into which your baby will enter the world. Our Prenatal Yoga [The Khalsa Way] program is a gentle yoga for pregnant mothers rooted in the ancient science and techniques of Kundalini Yoga. More than just a class, it is a program for life that addresses wellness, parenting, as well as community awareness issues.  Khalsa Way is a combination of Kundalini Yoga, other styles of yoga, dancing for birth, hypno-birthing techniques and much more. Its an empowering, strengthening and relaxing form of yoga that can be truly transformational.

data.name: HH Restorative Yoga-Zoom
data.description: Think adult nap time ! In truth, restorative yoga is simply that  restorative & It is well known for its calming and healing effect! This modality is a practice focused on breath control, meditation during long holds of postures (5-15 minutes) which are supported by props in order for the body to relax deeply. The mindfulness that… is found in all disciplines of yoga is taken to the next level. Prepare yourself to venture into the depths of the mind, loosen tension and enjoy long, meditative stretches while resting the body over pillows, blocks & blankets.This practice is helpful for those working with injuries sensitivities as well as for anyone feeling stressed out or anxious.

data.name: Breathwork Breakthrough
data.description: In this unconventional, mindful movement and breathwork class we redefine what progress and working hard means by focusing on the power and importance of rest. In response to the cultural pressure and need to constantly be productive, this class offers a different perspective: to be more fully and wholly well,… your body, mind, and spirit need time for recovery. Join Molly as she leads you through a variety of breathwork and restorative movement exercises focused on bringing awareness to and healing the areas of your body that require rest. If youd like to participate but wont be able to make it live, you can sign up and receive the recording after.  NOTE: This class will be held online via Zoom Video. Please be sure that you opt-in to our emails so that you receive the link to join this class.

data.name: Martial Mind
data.description: Martial Mind (Ages 5 - 7) is an 18-24 month, traditional martial arts-based Social and Emotional Learning (SEL) certification program, inspired by Headmaster Kwok's program designed for formal education. We, as educators, aim to nurture the character development of our students so they can grow into respectful,… well-coping, and moral individuals. As children at this age are still in the early stages of developing cognitive skills, the belt system is divided into different checkpoints for the preparation of their entry to the Juniors program.Besides learning to kick and punch properly, as well as age-appropriate self-defense techniques, we will spotlight a key theme, such as respect, focus, integrity, and self-control. We will demonstrate the meaning behind the selected theme and how it benefits the students' social skills and emotional competencies through physical practice. We aim to guide students to transfer the skills learned in class to their lives in academic and home settings.  Upon completion of the Martial Mind program, our students will receive an official certificate issued by Martial Arts Education Society. They are expected to progress in our Juniors Taekwon-do program at an accelerated rate.

At the Shala, vinyasa is shaped by the lineage… of Ashtanga Yoga: economic, rigorous, and challenging. All Level classes are a well-rounded blend of alignment and fluid movement. Open to beginning practitioners with some knowledge of foundational postures (Surya Namaskar, standing and seated poses, backbends), as well as intermediate and advanced practitioners interested moving in a gentler and more precise way. Guidance will be provided regarding safe alignment, strength-building, joint stabilization, and proper breathing technique.

data.description: Join us on Zoom! A link will be emailed to the address we have one file 15 minutes before class is set to begin.  Low impact. High reward. Our classic interval-training workout is designed to help you lose inches by burning fat and sculpting lean muscles. A well-designed sequence of specific movements will target and reshape… your muscles. And stretches incorporated throughout the class will tone and elongate your body. The best method to transform and renew you.Who it's for:Everyone  especially those seeking optimal fat-burning workouts and full-body transformation.  What you can gain:  Stronger, leaner musclesIncreased flexibilityImproved posture, core strength and balance

data.name: Rhythm Moves
data.description: Join in for a breath centered, rhythmic movement practice that flows with sequences inspired by dances of the African Diaspora. This energizing class will stretch and open the body, activate the core, ignite inner radiance.

data.name: MarcoYoga Vinyasa

data.name: Core Burner A
data.address: 6 East 30th Street Suite 201, New York, NY 10016Midtown
data.description: Sit ups and crunches are all well and good, but in order to build a strong, stable core we'll have to dig deeper. This class will not only rip up your midsection, but will carryover to all aspects of your life.

data.name: SPINNY POLE - LEVEL 2
data.description: In this class you will take your Level 2 static pole technique and apply it to the spinning pole. Youll learn creative ways to travel up and down the pole as well as how to control your speed while maintaining your flow. Pre-requisite: Must be comfortable with basic inversions.

data.name: Outdoor Conditioning
data.address: 371 Amsterdam Avenue 2nd Floor, New York, NY 10024UWS
data.description: Outdoor Conditioning Classes where GRFP classes began! Outdoor programs will be based on circuit training and functional conditioning. Outdoor classes will be performed either in Central Park or Riverside Park. Pickup and drop off will be at GRFP, 371 Amsterdam Ave. Portable equipment will be utilized, as well as… the track in Riverside. Please be able to run short distances.

data.name: Free Virtual Mat Class
data.description: The Pilates system really reveals itself on the Mat. All you need is a good WiFi connection, device with a camera & a mat/towel. Download the Zoom app and well get down on the Mat for a killer workout. Small props are optional, but encouraged.   This is a donation based complimentary community class. Donations can be made via… Venmo to Samone Weissman. You will receive a confirmation of your donation and reservation 30 minutes before class

data.name: Buti Yoga
data.description: Buti Yoga is a music-driven, soulful blend of power yoga, dance-cardio sprints, and deep abdominal toning. This HIIT-based yoga practice stretches + sculpts your body and mind to unlock the body's energy flow so you can be your best self. Grab your mat and get ready for sweat-inducing, soul-inspiring movement! This class is… NOT for beginners.

data.name: Virtual 30 Min. Restorative Pilates
data.address: 69 Columbia Street 3rd Floor, Brooklyn, NY 11201Columbia Street Waterfront District
data.description: 30 minutes of easeful movement designed to unkink backs, open hips, and support abdominals.  Needed: mat  A Zoom link will be emailed to you from Dibs 10 minutes before class begins.  If your roommate or partner joins, we strongly suggest that they sign up as well so the instructor will be paid fairly and can teach effectively.

data.name: VinHatha Flow-Zoom
data.description: A blend of Vinyasa breath movement and longer, more traditional Hatha holds, Vin-Hatha offers students the opportunity to both move through and be within the postures. With a focus on alignment and therapeutic techniques, students will explore what it means to find healthy, strong, empowering postures while… experiencing a deepening breath practice, allowing for stress and trauma to be diluted while optimal health and wellness to grow. This practice encourages deeper mindfulness, orientation and attunement within the postures. Classes will be challenging, creative and inspiring, guiding students to go beyond preconceived notions of who they are and what they can do on the mat.

data.name: Reiki + Restorative Yoga Workshop
data.address: 275 Grove Street 3rd floor , Jersey City, NJ 07302Downtown Jersey City
data.description: Relax and unwind as Shoko leads a special 2-hour session of restorative yoga and distance reiki healing... from Japan! This type of yoga can be a highly effective way to reduce stress and anxiety. Each reclined pose is supported with various props and is designed to encourage an effective release of stress and… tension.In this workshop you will experience: reiki assist to help clear blocked energy relaxing breathing techniques release of muscle tension without expending energy guided meditation to slow down the mind  What is Reiki?Reiki is an ancient form of universal energetic healing that encourages a state of balance, harmony, and self-healing. Reiki works on all levels of physical, emotional and spiritual elements to help reduce stress, anxiety and other ailments.  Combining both Restorative Yoga and Reiki allows for deep stillness to be found, as well as a transformative experience within and without. Sign up for Shoko's workshop through Mindbody. Problems signing up, email yogashunya@icloud.com.

data.name: Hour L2 LIVESTREAM
data.address: 135 West 20th Street 6th Floor b/w 6th & 7th Ave, New York, NY 10011Midtown
data.description: This is a one hour version of our Level 2 class  a well-rounded practice in a shorter amount of time. You have an understanding of the basic poses and transitional movements of a Vinyasa class (down dog, plank, chaturanga, cobra/upward dog). Youll get more dynamic sequences with challenging poses, subtle… alignment of basic poses, and an introduction to other yoga practices.  THIS IS AN ONLINE CLASS! Sign up here, and you'll receive an email to the address associated with your Yogamaya account with a link to take your class from afar.  First time joining us online?  If you are using a computer/laptop, please visit www.zoom.us to sign up. If you are joining us on your mobile device (phone, iPad, tablet, etc.), please download the Zoom app.  Please take a few moments to get to know the Zoom software, as it may be difficult for us to troubleshoot once you are in the class. If you have questions, please e-mail info@yogamayanewyork.com.

data.name: Pull-Ups at Home Livestream
data.address: 133 East 58th Street Suite 902, New York, NY 10022Midtown
data.description: Pull-Ups at Home in an intermediate level class focusing on your pull and push strength. Specifically pull-ups, front levers, back levers and any other modalities you would use a pull-up bar for as well as push-ups, planks, and planch progressions.You will need access to a pull-up bar or gymnastic rings for this class.Virtual classes… are booked at 55 minutes per class and conducted through Zoom. Please have your first name and initial of your last name displayed for your coach to view. Our classes require cameras on so we can cue you properly throughout your workout. You may start with volume off, but there may be instances where your coach asks you to turn it on. You are not permitted to record even if your system technically allows it. Links to virtual classes are sent via email roughly 60 minutes prior to class start time.  For Virtual Classes we anticipate you to have minimal equipment and limited space. However, your coach may reach out to you prior to the start of class to ask what equipment you have available so they can optimally program for your class. If a coach plans to reach out, generally for morning classes coaches will reach out the day before and for evening classes reach out earlier that day.

data.name: LAND Mama Glow - Women Only
data.address: 78 Franklin Street, New York, NY 10013Lower Manhattan
data.description: This is a LAND Class. NOT IN THE POOL.  MamaGlow Pre/Postnatal Yoga by maternity lifestyle maven Latham Thomas supports your health and well being throughout pregnancy as well as prepares you mentally, emotionally and physically for childbirth. The class is a safe and nurturing sequence of postures and exercises… that require no previous yoga experience. - Recommended for : Expectant, hopeful expectant, and new moms welcome.

data.name: Virtual Strength & Contrology
data.address: 69 Columbia Street 3rd Floor, Brooklyn, NY 11201Columbia Street Waterfront District
data.description: Strength & Contrology is our signature class that brings your fitness to a creative new level with complex body weight, mobility and challenging core movement. We use the floor, props and kettlebells to create strong muscles, body awareness, flexibility and proper alignment. Its a challenging workout but open to all.  A Zoom… link will be emailed 10 minutes before the class begins.  If your roommate or partner joins, we strongly suggest that they sign up as well so the instructor will be paid fairly and can teach effectively.

data.name: ONLINE: Alignment Flow
data.description: This class welcomes all yogis looking to refine and strengthen their physical alignment in their practice. This class will include longer holding of poses, the use of props and alignment based sequences to aid in strengthening and opening the body as well as creating ease, stability, and freedom in areas of tension. Get ready to… challenge your body and mind, yet rediscover the fundamentals of each asana.

data.name: Online Class on Zoom - Vinyasa II
data.description: This class will be held online via Zoom.$10 drop in, free for all members with unlimited passes.You'll need a an account with zoom (free), you might want to download the Zoom App. Register per usual via Mindbody or our free Namastuy App up to 30min before class & you'll get an email with a link and password to join in… 10min before class begin.    Glow. A fast paced, fluid practice that has a strong focus on breath to build heat from within. Students are guided through a sequence that will increase flexibility, as well as stability. Modifications and props are offered to make the class accessible to any level.

data.description: Find My Handstand

data.name: Livestream Evening Chill - Yoga
data.address: 100 Hudson Street  4th Fl. (entrance on 1st) , Hoboken, NJ 07030
data.description: Youve been movin and groovin all day... This is your time to chill! Come back to your breath, slow down the frenetic pace of urban living, tune into what your mind-body needs mostthen relax deeply with a sweet, restorative finish. To start, after some centering and warming, gentle movement, well flow breath by breath to a… beautifully chill soundtrack, while reigniting our personal and collective energy. After our vinyasa flow journey, well begin to take the energy back down, easing into postures that reconnect and relax US with grounding stretches that prepare the body and mind for letting go completely. Youll melt in passive restorative postures, supported by blankets, blocks and bolsters, to create a sense of space and openingand deep relaxation, effortlessly. Then youll float home, unencumbered by the events of the day. Sounds amazing, right?! OPEN LEVEL.

data.name: Vinyasa Flow - ONLINE
data.description: Turn your attention inward as you link your movement to your breath. Work up a sweat as you move through a dynamic series of postures. Open/Intermediate level.

data.name: Live Online: Level 1/Beginners
data.address: 150 West 22nd Street 2nd Floor, New York, NY 10011
data.description: Level I students, beginners as well as students who are brand new to Iyengar Yoga, will focus on fundamental postures including a basic inversion.

data.name: Row HIIT (Virtual Class) *ROWER REQUIRED
data.description: 30 Minute Virtual Class Using the Concept2 Rower at home follow us through 6 rounds of interval training . We use body weight exercises as well as some equipment like dumbbells and resistance bands.

data.name: Sattva Sunset Flow in the Park
data.description: Join us as we gather once more for Open Level Flow classes safely distanced outdoors!  You will find us at this lovely spot at Riverview on the Ogden Ave. and Griffith Street. Classes are by REGISTRATION ONLY, open to Monthly members and available with Sattva class packages, singles can be purchased as well.… NO DROP INS, no sales transactions on site. We must limit class size for distancing purposes.  Please bring a mat and be prepared to distance 6 feet apart. All participants must wear a mask upon arrival to check in with the teacher, masks can be removed when the practice begins..    WEATHER PERMITTING, you will be contacted no less than 1 hour before class if cancelled.

data.name: FREE Virtual:  Yoga HIIT 60 - Wed 7pm
data.description: Create heat in this 60-minute class that blends Baptiste Power Yoga with high-intensity interval training (HIIT). Join Certified Baptiste Leader, Dawn Rizzo and NASM Certified Personal Trainer, Ashley Iannacone for this combination workout intended to increase your muscle strength and endurance, as well as burn… calories and boost metabolism. Short bursts of exercise accompanied by short rests will both energize you and make you a cause for something bigger than yourself.  Tools Needed for this Practice:  1) Yoga mat or towel 2) Dumb bells, hand weights or two cans or two large water bottles 3) Yoga strap or hand towel.

data.name: Outdoor MESS Signature Maxwell Pier 12th Street
data.description: Come move, evolve, shake and sculpt with us OUTDOORS! This is our signature workout experience. This total body sculpt and conditioning class is balanced, challenging yet completely customizable. The movements and playlists are curated to flow seamlessly making this a workout that truly transcends. HBKN, we're… gonna hit all the right spots in all the right ways. #feelyourworkout   * All participants will need to supply their own mats. This outdoor class will be designed to utilize mostly body weight. If you have a mini band or Theraband bring that too! Class is typically taken in grippy socks but sneakers are highly suggested for this setting. We ask that if you are not feeling well stay home and come back when you're feeling better! Please come 10 minutes before class starts to allow time to set up with social distancing in mind. Masks are required at check in. We can't wait to MESS with you.

data.name: Bobby's Virtual Live Reformer Level 1  Wed 7:05PM
data.description: Level 1 is the Reformer class level following our Orientation Class. In this class the focus is on strengthening the abdominals and learning to stabilize your pelvis and spine while mastering the repertoire of Level 1 exercises. We recommend 15 - 20 sessions in Level 1 before asking your teacher if you are ready to… be tagged for the Mixed Level Class.The Mid Level requires spinal flexibility, good abdominal control as well as wrist and shoulder stability and strength to be able to handle the more advanced Pilates Reformer exercises. Keep this thought in mind...the more advanced you become and the more correct your technique and alignment becomes the more you realize that Level 1 is challenging when performed correctly!

data.name: Intermediate Level Reformer
data.description: Intermediate Level Reformer classes are ideal for clients who have consistently practiced and have a good understanding of the principles of Pilates as well as how to navigate the equipment. 55 minutes

data.name: Vinyasa | All Levels | Online, live via zoom
data.description: This is an online class that takes place live via Zoom. Sign up in advance of the class and receive an email invitation before the class begins. You'll need zoom account to join.  Vinyasa | All LevelsVinyasa is a moving meditation where each pose is strung together on the the thread of breath. At the Shala, vinyasa is shaped by the lineage… of Ashtanga Yoga: economic, rigorous, and challenging. All Level classes are a well-rounded blend of alignment and fluid movement. Open to beginning practitioners with some knowledge of foundational postures (Surya Namaskar, standing and seated poses, backbends), as well as intermediate and advanced practitioners interested moving in a gentler and more precise way. Guidance will be provided regarding safe alignment, strength-building, joint stabilization, and proper breathing technique.
